@description.name: @description
@description.body: Abstract base class for the {@link Row} and {@link Column} layers.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: color for event indexes

@description.name: @description
@description.body: color for odd indexes

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the color for the given index

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} Index to set the color for
@param.description: Index to set the color for

@param.name: @param
@param.body: color {Color|null} the color to set. A value of null will reset the color.
@param.description: the color to set. A value of null will reset the color.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Clear all colors set using {@link #setColor}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the color at the given index

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} The index to get the color for.
@param.description: The index to get the color for.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Color} The color at the given index
@return.description: The color at the given index

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the decorator for the given index

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} Index to set the color for
@param.description: Index to set the color for

@param.name: @param
@param.body: decorator {qx.ui.decoration.IDecorator|null} the decorator to set. A value of null will reset the decorator.
@param.description: the decorator to set. A value of null will reset the decorator.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the decorator at the given index

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} The index to get the decorator for.
@param.description: The index to get the decorator for.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.decoration.IDecorator} The decorator at the given index
@return.description: The decorator at the given index

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property colorEven. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #colorEven}.
